name: Fundraising Scratch Cards
description:
Football Fundraising Scratch Cards are a tried and testing way of paying weekly fees for a football or sports team.

Fundraising Scratch Cards works in the same way as traditional football scratch cards, where you sell off squares on a card and then scratch off a panel.

After the match players from both sides can buy a "square", each player picks a football team from the selection of 20 teams and enters their name.

Once the 20 teams are sold, the app will choose a winner at random. You then simply give half of the revenue to the winner and keep half for your club funds.

Fundraising Scratch Cards features 100 different football teams from all over the World which are selected at random, giving many billions of scratchcard options.

Traditionally football scratch cards are produced on card with a latex scratch panel, which is not terribly environmentally friendly as they are only used once.

You can now save environmental resources and raise money for your team at the same time.
